item.title: Certificates & Diploms

item.title: Skills
item.description: DEVELOPMENT SKILLS Skill Level Languages : Python, C#, Groovy, Java, Kotlin Expert Frameworks : Grails, ASP Core/MVC, Django, Flask, Laravel, Micronaut, Node JS, Spring Boot Expert FrontEnd & Movil : HTML5, Bootstrap, JQuery, React, React Native, Android Medium CMS & Documentation : Grav, Hugo, Docusaurus, Jekyll Medium Databases : SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, NoSQL (Redis, Mongo) Medium DATA SCIENCE & BIG DATA SKILLS Skill Level Data Science : Pandas, Numpy, Dash, Superset, Plotly, Seaborn, Matplotlib Advanced Big Data : PySpark, Apache Hive Advanced Machine & Deep Learning : Scikit-Learn, Keras, Knime Medium DATA SCIENCE & BIG DATA SKILLS Skill Level Data Science : Pandas, Numpy, Dash, Superset, Plotly, Seaborn, Matplotlib Advanced Big Data : PySpark, Apache Hive Advanced Machine & Deep Learning : Scikit-Learn, Keras, Knime Medium INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY SKILLS DevOps & Clouding • Docker, MicroServices • Kubernates, Openshift, DevOps • AWS, IBM, CI/CD, GIT • Azure OS and Web Servers • NGINX, Tomcat, IIS • Linux ( Ubuntu, Centos) • Apache Enterprise Architecture & Model • Archimate • UML, BPM • TOGAF

item.title: Skills
item.description: DEVELOPMENT SKILLS Skill Level Languages : Python, C#, Groovy, PHP, Java, Kotlin Expert Frameworks : Grails, ASP Core/MVC, Django, Flask, Laravel, Micronaut, Node JS, Spring Boot Expert FrontEnd & Movil : HTML5, Bootstrap, JQuery, React, React Native, Android SDK Medium CMS & Documentation : Grav, Hugo, Docusaurus, Jekyll Medium Databases : SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, NoSQL (Redis, Mongo) Medium Development Methodologies : SCRUM, Kanban, Atlassian Suite, TDD, ICONIX Medium Reporters: Jasper Report, Telerik Report, Crystal Reports Medium MATH& EDUCATION SKILLS Skill Level Mathematics : Probability & Statistics, Linear Algebra, Diferential Calculus, Discrete Math, Latex/Katex, Geogebra, Desmos, Scipy, SymPy, Octave Medium Education: STEAM, Virtual & Alternative Education, Canvas LMS, Moodle, SCORM Advanced DATA SCIENCE & BIG DATA SKILLS Skill Level Data Science : Pandas, PySpark, Numpy, Apache Hive, R Advanced Machine & Deep Learning : Scikit-Learn, Knime, Spark MLlib, NLKT, Keras Medium Data Visualization & BI : Dash, Superset, Plotly, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Tableau Advanced INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY SKILLS Skill Level DevOps & Clouding: Docker, MicroServices, Kubernates, AWS, GitOps, CI/CD, Azure, IBM Advanced OS and Web Servers : NGINX, Tomcat, IIS Server, Ubuntu, Centos, Apache Server Advanced Enterprise Architecture & Model: Archimate, UML, BPM, TOGAF Advanced Internet of Things & Network: LAN & Wireless Network, AWS IoT, Raspberry, Arduino Advanced
